line.text: Or whether doth my mind being crowned with you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Drink up the monarch plague this flattery
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or whether shall I say mine eye saith true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And that your love taught it this alchemy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To make of monsters and things indigest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Such cherubins as your sweet self resemble
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Creating every bad a perfect best
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As fast as objects to his beams assemble
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O tis the first tis flattery in my seeing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And my great mind most kingly drinks it up
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Mine eye well knows what with his gust is greeing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to his palate doth prepare the cup
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If it be poisoned tis the lesser sin
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That mine eye loves it and doth first begin
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
